channel.title: Connection Error, Retrying in
channel.description:
hey guys, i'm trying to connect to a servers webclient and i keep getting a connection error, retrying in.....
I've deleted the old cache, updated java, fucked with my environmental variables, etc. Still nothing works.
Can anyone help please?

item.title: Connection Error, Retrying in
item.dc:creator: @heatrn11 heatrn11
item.description:
@heatrn11 wrote:

[quote=“xDivinity, post:1, topic:431036”]hey guys, i’m trying to connect to a servers webclient and i keep getting a connection error, retrying in…

I’ve deleted the old cache, updated java, fucked with my environmental variables, etc. Still nothing works.

Can anyone help please?[/quote]
it’s the cache, does your webclient have autodownloadercache.java?

Read full topic
